templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_E
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains an order ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS whose ordering physician OPT_QUALIFIER in OPT_ORDDOC

statements.statement: select if (par1 ="OTHER") from prsnl pl where pl.name_full_formatted != " " and pl.name_full_formatted not between "0*" and "Z*" and pl.active_ind = 1 and pl.physician_ind = 1 elseif (par1="ALL") from prsnl pl where pl.name_full_formatted != " " and pl.active_ind=1 and pl.physician_ind = 1 else from prsnl pl where pl.physician_ind = 1 and pl.active_ind=1 and cnvtupper(pl.name_full_formatted)=patstring(concat(substring(1,1,par1),"*")) endif pl.name_full_formatted, _hidden=pl.person_id order name_full_formatted

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_INCOMING_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains an order ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS whose ordering physician OPT_QUALIFIER in OPT_ORDDOC and OPT_ORDER_DETAIL OPT_DETAIL_QUALIFIER OPT_LIST

statements.statement: select if (par1 ="OTHER") from prsnl pl where pl.name_full_formatted != " " and pl.name_full_formatted not between "0*" and "Z*" and pl.active_ind = 1 and pl.physician_ind = 1 elseif (par1="ALL") from prsnl pl where pl.name_full_formatted != " " and pl.active_ind=1 and pl.physician_ind = 1 else from prsnl pl where pl.physician_ind = 1 and pl.active_ind=1 and cnvtupper(pl.name_full_formatted)=patstring(concat(substring(1,1,par1),"*")) endif pl.name_full_formatted, _hidden=pl.person_id order name_full_formatted

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALC_SAVE_L
templateDefinitions.description: Create a value to be used by subsequent templates

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_DIAGNOSIS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: OPT_DIAGNOSIS exist with OPT_QUALIFIER, OPT_CONFIRMATION, OPT_CLASSIFICATION, OPT_CLINICAL_SERVICE, OPT_DX_TYPE, OPT_SEVERITY_CLASS, OPT_SEVERITY, OPT_CONTRIBUTOR_SYSTEM, OPT_RANK, OPT_CERTAINTY, for encounter OPT_LINK. Optionally narrow diagnosis matching by limiting cross-mapping to OPT_CROSS_VOCABS vocabularies OPT_PERSON_ACTIVITY concepts on patient’s profile and/or OPT_VOCAB_HIERARCHY hierarchy or ignoring concepts altogether OPT_IGNORE_CONCEPTS. Find all matches OPT_MATCH_ALL.

column.value: Including cross map patient activity data
Excluding cross map patient activity data

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with order status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS on OPT_SCOPE OPT_LINK whose date criteria is OPT_QUAL OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT from the anchor OPT_ANCHOR_DT_TM.

column.value: link to other template by the same accession_id
link to other template by the same encounter_id

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the order detail ORDER_DETAIL QUALIFIER LIST for any order(s) in LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULT_MOST_RECENT_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the most recent result for EVENT_SET_NAME is EVALUATION VALUE1 and OPT_VALUE2 for the same encounter as OPT_LINK over the last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_INC_ADDL_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the order detail ORDER_DETAIL QUALIFIER LIST1 and OPT_LIST2 for orders in LINK

statements.statement: select fld = if (d.seq = 1) "A" elseif (d.seq = 2) "B" elseif (d.seq = 3) "C" elseif (d.seq = 4) "D" elseif (d.seq = 5) "E" elseif (d.seq = 6) "F" elseif (d.seq = 7) "G" elseif (d.seq = 8) "H" elseif (d.seq = 9) "I" elseif (d.seq = 10) "J" elseif (d.seq = 11) "K" elseif (d.seq = 12) "L" elseif (d.seq = 13) "M" elseif (d.seq = 14) "N" elseif (d.seq = 15) "O" elseif (d.seq = 16) "P" elseif (d.seq = 17) "Q" elseif (d.seq = 18) "R" elseif (d.seq = 19) "S" elseif (d.seq = 20) "T" elseif (d.seq = 21) "U" elseif (d.seq = 22) "V" elseif (d.seq = 23) "W" elseif (d.seq = 24) "X" elseif (d.seq = 25) "Y" elseif (d.seq = 26) "Z" elseif (d.seq = 27) "0" elseif (d.seq = 28) "1" elseif (d.seq = 29) "2" elseif (d.seq = 30) "3" elseif (d.seq = 31) "4" elseif (d.seq = 32) "5" elseif (d.seq = 33) "6" elseif (d.seq = 34) "7" elseif (d.seq = 35) "8" elseif (d.seq = 36) "9" elseif (d.seq = 37) "ANY" else "OTHER" ENDIF FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(38))

SELECT IF (PAR1="ANY") SOURCE_STRING = "*ANYTHING", _hidden=0 elseif (PAR1 != "OTHER") SOURCE_STRING=n.source_string, _hidden=n.nomenclature_id, Vocabulary=cv.display FROM nomenclature n, code_value cv PLAN cv WHERE cv.code_set=400 and cv.active_ind=1 and cv.cdf_meaning in ("MUL.ALGCAT", "MUL.DRUG", "ALLERGY") JOIN n WHERE CNVTUPPER(n.source_string) =PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) AND n.source_vocabulary_cd= cv.code_value ORDER cnvtupper(n.source_string) else SOURCE_STRING=n.source_string, _hidden=n.nomenclature_id, Vocabulary=cv.display FROM nomenclature n, code_value cv PLAN cv WHERE cv.code_set=400 and cv.active_ind=1 and cv.cdf_meaning in ("MUL.ALGCAT", "MUL.DRUG", "ALLERGY") JOIN n WHERE cnvtupper(n.source_string)!=" " AND n.source_string NOT BETWEEN "0*" AND "Z*" AND n.source_vocabulary_cd= cv.code_value ORDER cnvtupper(n.source_string) ENDIF

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ALERT_FLEX_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Send alert OPT_TITLE stating TXT, OPT_CANCEL_LABEL, OPT_IGNORE_LABEL, OPT_OVERRIDE_REASON, OPT_MODIFY_LABEL, OPT_DEFAULT_LABEL, OPT_ORDERS, OPT_DEFAULT_FIRST_ORDER, OPT_URL_BUTTON_NAME, OPT_URL_ADDRESS, OK_BUTTON_NAME, OPT_FORM, OPT_FORM_BUTTON_NAME, OPT_FORCE_FORM, OPT_LINK

statements.statement: select distinct Form_Definition = if (t.seq = 1) dfr.definition else "*NONE" endif, _hidden = if (t.seq = 1) dfr.dcp_forms_ref_id else 0.0 endif, Description = if (t.seq = 1) dfr.description else "NONE" endif from dcp_forms_ref dfr, (dummyt t with seq=2) plan dfr where dfr.active_ind = 1 and textlen(trim(dfr.definition)) > 0 and textlen(trim(dfr.definition)) > 0 join t order Form_Definition

column.value: PowerPorm must be opened, dismiss Alert
PowerForm must be signed, dismiss Alert

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_ACTION_A
templateDefinitions.definition: STOP execution of subsequent action groups.
templateDefinitions.description: Stop execution of subsequent action groups

Conditional Discharge

is listed

value.value: select l=count(p.pathway_id) from pathway p, pathway_catalog pc where p.encntr_id = @encounterid:4 and p.pw_status_cd in (value(uar_get_code_by("MEANING",16769,"INITIATED")), value(uar_get_code_by("MEANING",16769,"DISCONTINUED"))) and p.started_ind = 1 and p.active_ind = 1 and pc.pathway_catalog_id = p.pathway_catalog_id and pc.description_key in ("ECARE STROKE ISCHEMIC OR TIA ADULT","STROKE ISCHEMIC OR TIA ADULT V2") head report log_retval=0 log_message="False" detail if(l > 0) log_retval=100 log_message="True" endif with nocounter go

value.value: select o=count(distinct a.allergy_id) from allergy a, nomenclature n, mltm_alr_category_drug_map macdm, mltm_alr_category_class_map maccm, mltm_alr_class mac where a.person_id = trigger_personid and a.active_ind = 1 and a.reaction_status_cd in (value(uar_get_code_by("MEANING",12025,"ACTIVE")), value(uar_get_code_by("MEANING",12025,"PROPOSED"))) and n.nomenclature_id = a.substance_nom_id and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate,curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate,curtime3) and macdm.drug_identifier = n.source_identifier and maccm.alr_category_id = macdm.alr_category_id and mac.class_id = maccm.class_id@NEWLINEand mac.class_id = 33 head report log_retval=0 log_message="False" detail if(o > 0) log_retval=100 log_message="True" endif with nocounter go

value.value: select ll=count(mr.order_recon_id) from order_recon mr, order_recon_detail mrd, orders o where mr.encntr_id = @encounterid:4 and mr.recon_type_flag = 3 and mrd.order_recon_id = mr.order_recon_id and mrd.recon_order_action_mean in ("RECON_CONTINUE","CONVERT_RX","CONVERT_HX","REPEAT") and o.order_id = mrd.order_nbr and o.order_status_cd = value(uar_get_code_by("MEANING",6004,"ORDERED")) and o.catalog_cd in (value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",200,"LOVASTATIN")),value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",200,"SIMVASTATIN")),value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",200,"ATORVASTATIN")),value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",200,"FLUVASTATIN")),value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",200,"ROSUVASTATIN")),value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",200,"PITAVASTATIN")),value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",200,"PRAVASTATIN"))) and o.orig_ord_as_flag in (1,2) head report log_retval = 0 log_message = "False" detail if(ll > 0) log_retval = 100 log_message = "True" endif with nocounter go

select lll=count(mr.order_recon_id) from order_recon mr, order_recon_detail mrd, orders o where mr.encntr_id = @encounterid:4 and mr.recon_type_flag = 3 and mrd.order_recon_id = mr.order_recon_id and mrd.recon_order_action_mean in ("RECON_CONTINUE","CONVERT_RX","CONVERT_HX","REPEAT") and o.order_id = mrd.order_nbr and o.order_status_cd = value(uar_get_code_by("MEANING",6004,"ORDERED")) and o.catalog_cd in (value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",200,"DABIGATRAN")),value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",200,"RIVAROXABAN")),value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",200,"APIXABAN")),value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",200,"EDOXABAN")),value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",200,"ARGATROBAN")),value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",200,"CLOPIDOGREL")),value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",200,"TICLOPIDINE")),value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",200,"ENOXAPARIN")),value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",200,"WARFARIN")),value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",200,"FONDAPARINUX")),value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",200,"DALTEPARIN")),value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",200,"BETRIXABAN")),value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",200,"HEPARIN")),value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",200,"ASPIRIN")),value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",200,"ASPIRINDIPHENHYDRAMINE"))) and o.orig_ord_as_flag in (1,2) head report log_retval = 0 log_message = "False" detail if(lll > 0) log_retval = 100 log_message = "True" endif with nocounter go
Ischemic Stroke Patient (Statin and Antithrombotic Prescribed at Discharge)

Increased serum lipid levels have proven to be a risk factor for recurrent ischemic strokes. Patients with a low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (LDL-c) level equal to or greater than 70 mg/dL should be discharged with statin therapy unless contraindications exist.

Antithrombotic therapy should be prescribed at discharge following acute ischemic stroke to reduce stroke mortality and morbidity as long as no contraindications exist.
Cancel Discharge order (Provider is to prescribe medication prior to discharging patient)
